channel.title: News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
channel.description: Recent content in News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

item.title: First call for 2023 is out!
item.description: The first call for application of 2023 is out The first call for application of 2023 is out. There are 15 funded scholarships available and 2 additional non-funded scholarships. Please visit the application page for further details. We are organizing an Open Day in early June to present the programme, stay tuned for more information soon!

item.title: ADSAI Open Day
item.description: ADSAI 2022 PhD program presentation (June 15, 2022; 14:30 GMT+1). Room Morin, H2bis building, University of Trieste (in person) live streamed online on Microsoft Teams. The ADSAI Open Day is An opportunity to meet, in person or remotely, the ADSAI faculty. At the Open Day we will present the 2022 program and will be available to discuss application opportunities and the overall ADSAI program structure.

item.title: Call for 2022 is out
item.description: 2022 call for application is out The call for application for 2022 is out. There are 14 funded scholarships available and 2 additional non-funded scholarships. Please visit the application page for further details.
